extends ItemNoveltyReranker<U,I>
    Profile distance item novelty re-ranker. S. Vargas. Novelty and diversity evaluation and enhancement in Recommender Systems. PhD Thesis. S. Vargas and P. Castells. Rank and relevance in novelty and diversity for Recommender Systems. RecSys 2011.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es), Pablo Castells (pablo.castells@uam.es)
